title: Storing Apples

items.name: Refrigerator crisper drawer
items.details: The best storage location. Cold temperature slows ripening significantly.

items.name: Keep away from ethylene producers
items.details: Store away from bananas and other fruits that release ethylene gas, which causes apples to ripen faster.

items.name: Cool dark place as backup
items.details: If no fridge room, a cool basement or pantry works but the fridge is the best option.

items.name: Apple variety differences
items.details: Red and dark-colored apples (Red Delicious, Fuji) have higher antioxidant levels. Tart varieties (Granny Smith) may be better for blood sugar control. Sweeter varieties (Fuji, Gala) have slightly higher sugar content.

notes: Apples are an excellent healthy snack, including for late-night eating. They are low in calories, high in fiber, and provide sustained energy. Compared to grapes, apples are more filling due to higher fiber content, while grapes are more hydrating and higher in antioxidants like resveratrol.
